channel.title: [508 bulby] ranged need some help
channel.description:
hello all,
i got some problems with ranged: when you fire you dont shoot an arrow no you hit your arrow and it fly's to an npc 0.o this is with a normal bow when i try to shoot with c'bow you go to an npc and fire wtf 0.o and my last problem is when you fire darkbow you go to npc and hit it with fist i try to fix it but it wont work im stuck at it :( could some one helps me with this problems one of the problems i really want to fix is dbow i like it soo much could some one help me please i tryd already dbow but i fails :(:(
